price: Do not lose heart nor grieve, for you have the upper hand, if you are [truly] believers.
arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
